net.dean.jraw.models

Class JsonModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.models.JsonModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountPreferences, FlairTemplate, KarmaBreakdown.SubredditKarma, LiveUpdate.Embed, OAuthData, OEmbed, RedditObject

    public abstract class JsonModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides an abstract model for retrieving data from a JSON node, although not necessarily relating to the Reddit API.

    • Method Detail

      • data

        public java.lang.String data(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieves a textual value from the JSON node.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to look up in the JSON node.
        Returns:
        The textual value of the value of the Object returned by looking up the given key.

      • data

        public <T> T data(java.lang.String key,
         java.lang.Class<T> type)

        Retrieves a value from the JSON node (provided in the constructor) of type T. Supported types:

        • Classes that autobox/unbox to primitive types (Boolean, Double, Integer, Float, Long)
        • java.lang.String
        • java.net.URI
        • java.net.URL
        • java.util.Date
        Type Parameters:
        T - The desired return data type
        Parameters:
        key - The key to look up in the JSON node. Must not be null.
        type - The wanted return value. Supported values are any class representing a primitive data type, such as Integer or Boolean. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        An object of type T in the JSON node
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the class given was not one mentioned above

      • getDataNode

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getDataNode()

        This method gets the "data" JsonNode. In a traditional API request (let's say to /r/pics/about.json), the Reddit API returns some JSON data. An example would look like this: 

        {
     "kind": "t5",
     "data": {
         "submit_text_html": null,
         "user_is_banned": false,
         "id": "2qh0u",
         ...
     }
 }

        The "data" node contains all the properties essential to this model.

        Returns:
        The JsonNode to get data from

      • asString

        protected java.lang.String asString(java.lang.Object val)
        Convenience method to be used in toString() methods that returns the String literal "null" if the given value is null. If the object's toString() method throws a NullPointerException, then the String literal "(NullPointerException) is returned. If no exceptions were thrown, then this method returns val.toString().
        Parameters:
        val - The object to evaluate
        Returns:
        A string representation of the object

      • getJsonProperties

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Method> getJsonProperties(java.lang.Class<? extends JsonModel> thingClass)
        Gets a list of fields that have the JsonInteraction annotation attached to them. This method also returns JsonInteraction-annotated methods in this class' superclasses, up until JsonModel. Used for testing.
        Parameters:
        thingClass - The class to search in
        Returns:
        A list of fields that have the JsonInteraction annotation
